tasks.task: Planting hot pepper seedlings in pots
subtasks: Mix soil components for potting mix
Fill pots with soil, leaving 4 inches headspace
Gently transplant seedlings, tease roots apart
Position plants in pots, create a moat around roots
Store unused soil for future use
Break down materials using house wrap as a weed block
Weed around plants and compost bins
Assessing need for air conditioning unit relocation
